text: Bachia psamophila is a species of lizard in the family Gymnophthalmidae. It is endemic to Brazil. ==References== Category:Bachia Category:Reptiles of Brazil Category:Endemic fauna of Brazil Category:Reptiles described in 2007 Category:Taxa named by Miguel Trefaut Rodrigues Category:Taxa named by Dante Pavan Category:Taxa named by Felipe F. Curcio
title: Bachia psamophila
